Description: Rare Mid Eighties (1985) Yamaha SBG 1000 Black Beauty Guitar: This Gem was made in Japan in the mid eighties (1985) as per it's original Yamaha Warr. Tag (Included) in the sale. This Guitar appears to have spent most of it's life in it's case as it's in great shape for being 34 years of age. This shows only light handling, pick swirls/ scratches, however no dings, dents or major marks and the gold metal finish shows most of it's original plating. The original protective plastic is still on the rear panels and this sale includes the original warranty card with Dealer information and signed to this guitar in April of 1985. This includes the original Yamaha case, Original Warr. Card (as shown) and some case candy as pictured. This guitar is amazing, and 100% original. it's all stock and top quality. Please do research these, they are heavy, a great slab of mahogany with ebony triangular block beautiful mother pearl inlays. Push/pull tone controls that gives you a great range of sounds. And this one is a rare find in this condition. Please view the pictures as your best overall example of condition. Case shows some wear here and there, but also quite nice and solid for it's age, just shows more wear than the guitar itself. Don't miss your chance to own this high quality made in Japan gem, being sold with a low starting bid and no-reserve! Shipping is a flat $89 to the lower 48 states. USA Sales Only Please! Note: All items sold as described, as-is and final. Only what is shown in the pictures is included, nothing more. This is a vintage used item and may show sings of wear/ playing use, etc. Regardless please view the pictures as they are your best overall example of condition, as condition can be subjective. This was an estate find and we are by no means experts, so again please view the pictures and ask any questions prior to bidding. Only what is shown in the pictures is included, nothing more. Thank you and best of luck!
